summary:
Lowers the weight of alchemy ingredients.Weight is lowered by 50% in most cases.

A few items (like butterfly wings) are <50%, and a few (like Giants Toe) are >50%.

The UI won\'t display hundredths so 0.05 *displays* as 0.10 but is still calculated correctly.

descriptionHtml:
Lowers the weight of alchemy ingredients.Weight is lowered by 50% in most cases.

A few items (like butterfly wings) are <50%, and a few (like Giants Toe) are >50%.

The UI won\'t display hundredths so 0.05 *displays* as 0.10 but is still calculated correctly.

NOTE: Apparently this can cause localization issues?, so if anyone would like to help make their localization let me know!

Also available on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7421
author: Jynnent_Onyx
